• Cornell Tech’s MBA program is designed to enhance the New York tech scene by creating a wave of technology focused business leaders; it is this nexus of business and technology that I am very passionate about and am eager to be a part of with the knowledge I would gain from this program.

• This unique technology focused business study program is something that I have not been able to find elsewhere and as a result I am not applying to any other programs.
